actualize

public void actualize(SaleOfGoods saleOfGoods)
Description copied from class: Consumer
Actualize the specified SaleOfGoods transaction. The default implementation simply tracks the amount spent, the quantity of goods purchased, and the consumer suplus. It assumes willingness to pay is constant (i.e., one unit of the good for each natural person represented by this consumer agent).

Overrides:
actualize in class Consumer
